page.title: 13Laverstock youth recreation.
page.content: There are two Brownie packs in Laverstock, meeting Fiday evenings in the Village Hall. At pack meetings many games are played. Before you become a Brownie there is a four week waiting list before enrollment. At Brownies there is the usual 'bookwork' offering the Footpath, Road and Highway badges together with many other opportunities for learning new skills and helping people. The Scouts this year went on a weekend camp. There were eight scouts and three leaders, set to go to Great Yews, Coombe Bissett. The camp was a great success. Survival was the keynote, boiling all water, making a bivouac, night hike and a sing-song round the camp fire, were activities enjoyed by all. Monday 6th May saw the group home, very tired and grubbier!
